thread.title: WI: Wisconsin Democrats Seek to Amend Constitution to Protect Open Records, Meetings Laws
thread.title_full: WI: Wisconsin Democrats Seek to Amend Constitution to Protect Open Records, Meetings Laws

title: WI: Wisconsin Democrats Seek to Amend Constitution to Protect Open Records, Meetings Laws
text:
02 WI: Wisconsin Democrats Seek to Amend Constitution to Protect Open Records, Meetings Laws 
Government Technology: Democratic lawmakers in Wisconsin are calling for a constitutional amendment to protect the state's open records and meetings laws from future tinkering.The proposal is one of several announced Wednesday as part of a package to combat what they describe as attempts by Gov. Scott Walker and the Republican majority to weaken Wisconsin's protections against cronyism and corruption.
